statusLine.command: input=$(cat); project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); if [ "$project_dir" != "null" ] && [ -d "$project_dir" ]; then project_name=$(basename "$project_dir"); printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m in \033[1;34m%s\033[0m • %s" "$model" "$project_name" "SmartPin TPO Navigation Analysis"; else printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m • %s" "$model" "SmartPin TPO Navigation Analysis"; fi
